name: Swift Exporters
title: Fastest Customs Clearance
description: In 2023, Croatia achieved the fastest average time to clear exports through customs, taking only 1.1 days. This efficiency places Croatia at the forefront of global trade facilitation.

name: Judicial Excellence
title: Top Institutional Infrastructure for Insolvency
description: Croatia's judicial system ranks among the best globally, with a score of 91.67 in 2024 for its quality of institutional and operational infrastructure for judicial insolvency proceedings.

name: Tuberculosis Detectives
title: Leading in Tuberculosis Case Detection
description: In 2023, Croatia excelled in tuberculosis case detection, achieving a rate of 190%, indicating a robust healthcare system capable of identifying and addressing TB cases effectively.
